attributes.action: Stop taxing people with the excuse of 'Global Warming', at least until developing Countries do the same.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's unfair how we have to pay such a financial price for Global Warming when we contribute such a meagre amount to it, a fraction of the emissions of many emerging Countries such as China, India, Russia etc.
It's a threat to the economy and our industries, such as the MOD which now has to think about how to go green, something an organisation with far more serious concerns shouldn't have to worry about.
